description: Manchester United defender Jayde Riviere has signed a new three-year contract at the club.
title: Manchester United: Jayde Riviere signs new contract with WSL team
title_page: Manchester United: Jayde Riviere signs new contract with WSL team - BBC Sport
maintext:
Manchester United defender Jayde Riviere has signed a new three-year contract at the club, with the option to extend by a further year.
The Canada international joined United in 2023 and has made 32 appearances.
The 23-year-old has established herself as a regular at right-back under manager Marc Skinner.
"I feel the honour of being a Manchester United player every time I step on the pitch, so I'm thrilled that this journey is going to continue," Riviere said.
"Winning the FA Cup last season gave us all a taste of success and I'll continue to give everything I have to achieve more moments like that for our fans."
Riviere is one of several key players the club wanted to tie down with contract extensions, having triggered the one-year option clause in England midfielder Grace Clinton's contract last week.
